title: saxydev
author: saxydev
content: Some lists of scam sites and their crypto addresses:address must contain transactions before beind added to the list1. https://zollarsfinance.com/bc1qlk9l3mvxdz6w73r3nrpz5elf99nltkjlrrpqw5TMTK3a6fNR9x8wLg9MCwbsjV2WiYWcWFxC2. https://zonixcapital.com/bc1q48wmvzppqhcylrn2lqjhuwzrcasnde57zerflx0xc486f7982605720A635AF7b3856151D813fe9A3FTTZNY5amAhQEAaioUTq2mje3kNuuuSiX5s3. https://metaxfinance.orgbc1q93w8u3dhvsrzlwttl7t7lcdyry03a4xuu4znm60xCb6AcC7a1dD40F1d39C76F687c6A09dCAcBD3c3cTFoRmaBbFHWSnm2Q4RbXT8Qdde677a7FLV4. https://darivfx.comTRarYfpfwskmrdq2XpLy4gUxSq8ojFTUXG5. https://trustsmining.com/bc1qlc59pn9ju0nyx6hmzncgw4fhj0nfza2xt5s3v36. https://theprimesinvestment.com/0x1FB2148a9AB0aE20Ff790CfA7d036b646C702f657. https://magcryptox.online/1GcworjwaxzTrdN2YPHCv1MDzHQQdqgyp48. https://bitmininginc.cloud/1NZvtpZpanxMieYNwtr2xMe6t3ZcjCcknG9. https://baselinefxoption.com/bc1qlgqdntat5aluqp7jn7m8x3d35p02j20gpmz4gl0x0df23B88de8600e53607685C388B1e0FafC39eaB10. https://ukforexbiz.com/TUWVysmTpuL4hwE6V9cjmwF4qAfwm6ANbdList to be updated in the topic every few days

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: How you can get those address in the first place? because I don't see those sites posted their address in their sites, are you create an account and then check every of their address? I also use google search, but can't find any report, just a blockchain transactions. Just to make sure you're not list a wrong address here.Quote from: saxydev on November 18, 2022, 04:51:10 AM4. https://darivfx.comTRarYfpfwskmrdq2XpLy4gUxSq8ojFTUXGI don't want to defend this site, but how you can determine this is scam? I don't find they're offer ponzi scheme just like the other sites. They only write copy trading, even few popular centralized exchange offer this feature.

In my databases I have a screenshot for each site, but it's not worth sending it until someone if needs it.Regarding darivfx, are you blind?They are offering:QuoteFor 1 YearTotal 160%$1000 - $4999https://i.ibb.co/FJtVMKt/photo-2022-11-17-23-40-38.jpgBefore posting, look yourself for info, don't just post for your signature campaign

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: OP, you have started a very complicated process. maybe it's interesting to you now, but I'm afraid that in the long term you'll lose the will to update further. new scams like this are launched every day and it really takes a lot of time if you want to document and verify each address. Plus they will occasionally change them, which means additional work for you.However, good luck to you and your initiative.I would suggest you, don't make those websites linkable. You don't want to give them free ads and backlinks, right?Update 1st post with all newly founded websites and their addresses, maybe some sort of table.if you run out of new ideas and new scam websites, here is a good base for you [SCAM ALERT] List 800+ scam websites (Updated 27.October '22)

comments.author: saxydev
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on November 19, 2022, 12:14:49 PMOP, you have started a very complicated process. maybe it's interesting to you now, but I'm afraid that in the long term you'll lose the will to update further. new scams like this are launched every day and it really takes a lot of time if you want to document and verify each address. Plus they will occasionally change them, which means additional work for you.However, good luck to you and your initiative.I would suggest you, don't make those websites linkable. You don't want to give them free ads and backlinks, right?Update 1st post with all newly founded websites and their addresses, maybe some sort of table.if you run out of new ideas and new scam websites, here is a good base for you [SCAM ALERT] List 800+ scam websites (Updated 27.October '22)Backlinks for google matters up to not at all, so that's not a worry. Better to have a mention of them here as scam than their domains. They appear daily, that's true. I have a database of over 15k+ sites with screenshots and addresses and I add arround 100-150 daily.That base is very much outdated.And about posting their addresses is very much important because that's basically the only real and valid tracking unit we have to not let this scammers launder their coins freely. Myself I work as aml in crypto so this is mostly my daily job.But thanks very much for your input! much appreciated

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: saxydev on November 19, 2022, 01:01:20 PMBacklinks for google matters up to not at all, so that's not a worry. Better to have a mention of them here as scam than their domains. They appear daily, that's true. I have a database of over 15k+ sites with screenshots and addresses and I add arround 100-150 daily.it is certainly not necessary to raise their domain authority (every backlink helps in that, whether you like it or not). Plus, be sure that there is a great chance that someone will click on your link here, even if it says that it is an obvious scam and even invest in it. happened something similar.QuoteThat base is very much outdated.There are no outdated lists. many of these domains will later be auctioned, future owners should know their history. if only that.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: While there is a scam accusation, there should have enough evidence against the scammer. But on here you have just posted the domain name as well as the bitcoin wallet. How anyone relies on that? A scam accusation stands to let people know about the incident and/or to save the community. But only the name of the domain and wallet address will not do that as there is no evidence.

comments.author: saxydev
comments.body: Quote from: shasan on January 22, 2023, 10:20:12 PMWhile there is a scam accusation, there should have enough evidence against the scammer. But on here you have just posted the domain name as well as the bitcoin wallet. How anyone relies on that? A scam accusation stands to let people know about the incident and/or to save the community. But only the name of the domain and wallet address will not do that as there is no evidence.Besides the fact that I am sad I have removed you from my ignore list.. In case anyone wants to see screenshots of these addresses on the websites to confirm they are being used for scamming users or the fact that they are a scam is which is not debatable, send me a PM and I will provide for each address in PM.No need to upload 10 screenshots for each post I have made, I just don't have the time.I kind of forgot about this thread. I will come back the following days when I have more time to update the list with some new domains and addresses.Update:1.https://stocksfxempire.com/15FRtebqmgdjHJrQfqgsb9j2D3HuX3dLip2.https://goreexpert.live/14zQWuomG8Yo7Vk6YZyGp672bLRwRxzpcD0x9182ab27d0ee4692978c8e113a63b62f3dbc2e903.https://primetradeoptions24.com/1F9ceap5VsFYwkv5zhf64hQ1SuKXizzpW4.https://account.corpratefinance.com/bc1qlhegvx4yqxsjxtx8ek6tekc66e7zdjvstz4sq3TMbRpNTE54bhKr864Eg2gMmC11ZcR3fo9q5.https://spacexetoken.com/113TzJdceTaR7dNsaAkXaRCrfuyoJgFQoQ0x0241c9193e27e377502dD42cE0e7f900E75D5677TYBkTsens4emVsoQg2AuEmdjtEQo97Hgyu6.https://salvadorfx.org/bc1q0p4fy68qqk69z5ytlpg8e5w9gxnade2rr37lxwTCMk2MqSuGxhywtHRkYDKUb3jLnKUuZyXX7.https://agrocapital-management.com/39Zsx1v6cxKy4QsxXDSffSSM3T1JodD1gtTNbL11vzSN2EN1rnFtjtvErXaJTAMVmZYe8.https://age-minners.co/bc1qnjyr0rwj45vyrmner7d83l6u6fjlmut6zp6clcTXgtWVa4caxN9jhBihLLzTRAFbJxWZGp8R

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: shasan on January 22, 2023, 10:20:12 PMWhile there is a scam accusation, there should have enough evidence against the scammer. But on here you have just posted the domain name as well as the bitcoin wallet. How anyone relies on that? A scam accusation stands to let people know about the incident and/or to save the community. But only the name of the domain and wallet address will not do that as there is no evidence.Anyone who offers 125% (just for example) of profit within 24 hours cannot be legitimate. It's always a fraud and we certainly shouldn't wait for the fraud to happen to mark them with a red flag. things like this are just prevention.OP, I told you earlier that what you tried to do takes a long time and can be tedious for a long period of time.
